title: Message coding app
description: Steganography based image coding app. User can code secret message inside image. Message itself is encrypted using random encryption key. Decryption key with login and hashed password are saved inside database. Every coded message contains unique login. Non hashed password is given to the user upon codec image creation.

title: Drink App
description: App that helps to find your next drink. It's hard to find tasty drink recipe. This app helps you with that, You can search drinks by name or by ingredient.

title: Example Company website

title: Nasa APOD

title: Happines Charts
description: Simple App that allows user to generate charts about Happiness data with x and y axes selected by user.

title: Weather forecas
description: Weather forecast for any city in 1 to 5 days time span.
